info.title: Tailor's Mall
info.description: Tailors Mall (Tailora) is a platform built to connect tailors and clients, providing powerful tools for designers to showcase their portfolios, clients to search and filter designers, and both to engage in meaningful interactions.

example.title: Graphic Designer Needed for Branding Project
example.description: We are looking for a skilled graphic designer to help with our branding project. The work includes designing logos, marketing materials, and digital assets.
